thoughts.thoughtText: I'm so sick of trying to keep this weight off; I just want so me funkin' ICE CREAM!
Players gon' play because they can't take anything seriously.
Charlie stinks, bro. Getting tired of it.

reactions.reactionText: Yeah, and you still won't DO nothin' about it.

thoughts.thoughtText: I'm deleting my account rn....Helooooo? Anyone listening? I said I'm going to delete my account!

reactions.reactionText: I'm not deleting my account, I'm just going to hide my account so you chase me.
